resources.string: Beacon Hill Park is a 75 ha park located along the shore of Juan de Fuca Strait in Victoria, British Columbia.

The waterfront green space along Dallas Road is a popular destination, enjoyed by many people for a variety of uses. Located between Douglas Street and Clover Point, the green space offers a flat walking path and access to the stretch of beaches and shoreline.
At Rebar, eating modern means being aware: aware of where your food comes from and preparing and serving food responsibly, from seed to table.

Hand - made from fresh ingredients like non-gmo vegetables sourced locally whenever possible. Our special sauces are house made, with no added MSG. We support sustainable and ethical producers, with farm-to-plate practices that deliver a premium product with trusted transparency.
